Television camera filming [Serbia](/wiki/Serbia_national_football_team "Serbia
national football team") versus [Brazil](/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team
"Brazil national football team") in [Group
E](/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup_Group_E "2018 FIFA World Cup Group E").

[FIFA](/wiki/FIFA "FIFA"), through several companies, sold the **[broadcasting
rights](/wiki/Broadcasting_rights "Broadcasting rights") for the [2018 FIFA
World Cup](/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup "2018 FIFA World Cup")**[1] to the
following broadcasters.
